release:
- After this update, our team will take a rest with updates and enjoy this beautiful app we have made!

- New: Server side scrapers now. Me and the team can now add/fix them without updating app to fix them. App will go full server side in the next upcoming updates.

- Cached Torrent Support.

- Add option: Sort by seasons/episodes by Newest to Oldest

- Me and the team have been looking for providers and we have found many. Real-Debrid/All-Debrid users will love this update

- Add option: Users set an user agent. This is a new invisible webview engine. It's automatically on and set. Read instructions in settings to configure this correctly.
.
